name: nfsab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, w0)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for a class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
